captions.en: This is the door of my room
There’s nothing special
It’s just an all-white door
light switch
This is a light I bought on Amazon
for decoration
Actually, if you look at it in person,
It's blue
but I don't know why on camera
it's purple
This is my bed
Actually, this comforter wasn’t the first one I bought
Although I liked it from the beginning when I saw it,
I was afraid that it was too big
so I chose a smaller one
A brown comforter
then I felt like the colors didn't match well together
So I returned that one
and replaced it with this one
These two pillows came together with the comforter
and so was this pillowcase
But I bought the pillow inside
and then let’s look at the desk
It came with the house
This lamp is quite cheap
I think I bought it from Target…
Yeah, it’s from Target
I think I also got this from Target
They're fake flowers
I think this potted plant is very artistic
I love it
I picked this one up at the IU club fair (IU: Indiana University)
I’ve put some seeds in it
but it never grows
I’m just about ready to give up lol
I’ll just put it here for decoration
And this alarm clock
If you've seen my first vlog
It might look familiar to you
It shows up at the beginning of my first vlog
I brought it over from Taiwan
and this is a microphone
I brought from Taiwan as well
and here are some books
and this is Lao Tzu
It's in English
This one is The Analects of Confucius
It’s also in English
I got both of them at a previous school event
This is a notebook which I like a lot
I bought it in the States
I think it's beautiful
I love the golden edge
but I rarely see this type of book in Taiwan
And these are some notebooks and study materials I brought from Taiwan
And then, these are the perfumes I often wear
and this is a thermos that I bought in the States
This is a desk mirror
because I do makeup at my desk
so I kind of need a desk mirror like this
There are just some miscellaneous things inside
Some books, my glasses, my airpods
notebook, post-it notes , and pencil case
that's about it
And then the drawer next to it is pretty messy
These are the things I often use
like Q-tips
and sunscreen that I wear before going out
earrings
And then here are some little gifts that I brought from Taiwan for my students
Here are two boxes
I bought it after moving here
because there aren't any drawers here
I thought it didn’t look good to just put things in there
so I bought two boxes
It’s just some cables in this box
and some camera accessories
On the bottom side
these two boxes are actually lids for them
So they could be covered up
but it's very inconvenient for me to use
Also I happened to need two boxes here
so I put them on the bottom layer
Here are some meds I brought from Taiwan
and here are some manicure supplies
Nail polish remover
what you use to remove nail polish
And then here's just some random stuff
I just put them over here
This is my chair
It’s extremely uncomfortable to sit on
If I didn’t buy this cushion
this chair would not be even
When you sit on it, you’ll slide back
And it is too low
If I sit without the cushion
after about three or four hours
I will have a backache
So I decided to buy a cushion on Amazon
and problem solved!
It makes this chair taller
and more comfortable to sit on
This is my closet
There are some coats on the left side
And because the weather is getting colder now
so I've hung up more long-sleeved shirts here
And here are some short-sleeved shirts and pants inside
I've got some handbags hanging in here
and this is the neck pillow I used on the flight here
Inside are my suitcases
and my badminton shoes
My favorite part of the closet is this big mirror
I really like this mirror
so much so that I want to buy a closet with this big mirror when I’m back in Taiwan
and here is my dresser
I've got four spaces in my dresser for me to put stuff in
um, just some clothes over here.
My sports shirts and thermal tops
and some pants
Here's some…
also some random things
because I don't have that many clothes yet
I haven't used this drawer
So I put it in some things that I don't use often
These are film lights
but I haven't used them yet
so I don't know how well it works
And there are some decorations on top of the dresser
I bought this at Goodwill
I think it's pretty cute
Cactus
My roommate picked this up for me
I also bought this one at Goodwill
It’s a reed diffuser in the back
I don’t usually buy reed diffusers
but because when I first moved into this room
I felt like there was a kind of weird smell
so eventually I went to buy this reed diffuser
and now the problem is solved
I love the smell of the room now
Here is a decoration that I really like
This!
because it's the first letter of “Grace”,
I thought it was very meaningful
so I bought it
And then this is another fake plant
because I'm really bad at taking care of plants
I often forget to water plants when I’m busy
so I thought, well… I'll just buy a fake one
That's all for my room tour
Even though my room isn't very big,
I really like the layout
Especially since I have a window in front of my desk
which is really convenient for
shooting videos
If I film videos in the morning,
I don't need to set up any lighting
and also I really like filming with natural light
Anyway
I'm really happy with the room
And the rent is actually pretty cheap
I think overall it’s pretty worth it
There are just some minor issues
in the kitchen and bathroom
Like, some things aren't working
and a faucet is leaking, etc.
We need to take care of them
but here there's a system where I can report issues
and a staff member will come and fix things
So I’ve been pretty satisfied so far
There aren't very big issues
Ok, I hope you enjoyed today's video
See you next time! Bye!
